data.comment: The match has started.
Goal! Brentford have got their heads in front thanks to a Vitaly Janelt strike.
In the minute 14, Great play from Rico Henry to set up the goal.
Lyndon Dykes levels the score at 1-1.
Bright Osayi-Samuel with an assist there.
In the minute 29, Niko Hamalainen for QPR has been booked by Matt Donohue and receives a first yellow card.
Brentford's Mads Bech has been booked in London.
Matt Donohue blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Brentford make their first substitution with Mathias Jensen replacing Joshua Da Silva.
Pontus Jansson is on a sub for Henrik Dalsgaard for Brentford.
In the minute 64, Goal! Ivan Toney heads Brentford into a 2-1 lead.
Emiliano Marcondes instrumental with a fine assist.
Todd Kane (QPR) has received a yellow card from Matt Donohue.
In the minute 71, Thomas Frank is making the team's third substitution at Griffin Park with Sergi Canos replacing Tarique Fosu.
Thomas Frank (Brentford) is making a fourth substitution, with Marcus Forss replacing Emiliano Marcondes.
George Thomas is replacing Chris Willock for the away team.
In the minute 74, At Griffin Park, Dominic Ball has been yellow-carded for the away team.
The away team replace Dominic Ball with Albert Adomah.
Todd Kane has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
In the minute 85, The away team replace Niko Hamalainen with Macauley Bonne.
Saman Ghoddos is replacing Bryan Mbeumo for the home team.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-1.
Sergi Canos for Brentford has been booked by Matt Donohue and receives a first yellow card.
